cor_flex

Source: R/flex_functions.R
cor_flex.Rd

cor_flex

Usage

cor_flex(x, ...)

Arguments

x

data to use

...

other arguments passed to stats::cor()

Value

numeric

Examples

m <- matrix(rnorm(100), nrow = 10)

cor_flex(m)
